title: Successful login with valid credentials
description: Verify that users can log in successfully using valid username and password credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username and password.
Click the login button.
Verify the user is authenticated and redirected to the POS dashboard.

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that users cannot log in with invalid username or password and appropriate error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username or password.
Click the login button.
Verify login fails and error message indicating invalid credentials is displayed.

title: Add automotive products to POS cart
description: Verify that a user can select products including oil with specified partial volume and add them to the cart successfully.

steps.description: Login and access POS interface.
Search and select an oil product.
Specify partial oil volume less than full bottle volume.
Add product with partial volume to cart.
Add filter and parts products to cart with full quantities.
Verify all selected products appear in the cart with correct quantities and volumes.

title: Apply discounts during sales
description: Verify that various discount types can be applied to products or entire cart and reflect accurately in the total amount.

steps.description: Add multiple products to the cart.
Apply percentage discount on one product.
Apply fixed amount discount on the entire cart.
Verify that discounts are calculated correctly and total price is updated accordingly.

title: Complete sale with multiple payment methods
description: Validate that a user can complete a sale using different payment methods (cash, credit card, digital wallets) and system generates receipt correctly.

steps.description: Add items to cart.
Select a payment method (test cash, credit card, digital wallet separately).
Complete the payment process.
Verify sale is successful, inventory is updated, and receipt is generated with correct payment and sale details.

title: Inventory auto-update after sale with partial oil volume handling
description: Validate inventory is updated appropriately after a sale including decrementing partial volumes from open oil bottles.

steps.description: Sell an oil product specifying partial volume usage.
Verify inventory stock updates by reducing the open bottle's remaining volume correctly.
Verify inventory level for other items in the sale decrements correctly.

title: Process refund and update inventory
description: Verify that refunds can be processed by selecting previous sales, and inventory is correctly adjusted back with refund receipt generated.

steps.description: Search previous sale by invoice or date.
Select items and quantities to refund.
Complete refund transaction.
Verify inventory is incremented properly, especially partial oil volumes if applicable.
Verify refund receipt is generated with correct refund details.

title: Add, edit, and batch track inventory items
description: Validate inventory managers can add new products, edit existing ones including batch cost, quantity, expiration and verify these are tracked correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to main inventory management page.
Add a new product with batch information (cost, quantity, expiration date).
Edit an existing product to update batch details.
Verify batch tracking details are stored and displayed correctly.

title: Trigger stock alert for low inventory
description: Verify system triggers alert notifications for inventory items at or below stock alert levels.

steps.description: Set low-stock alert threshold for a product.
Perform sales transactions reducing stock to alert threshold.
Verify that stock alert notification is triggered for the product.

title: Inventory transfer between branches
description: Validate branch managers can transfer inventory between branches and that stock levels update appropriately at origin and destination.

steps.description: Navigate to inventory transfer interface.
Select source branch and destination branch.
Select products and quantities to transfer.
Confirm and complete transfer.
Verify source branch inventory is decremented and destination branch inventory incremented correctly.
Verify transfer record is logged with correct details.

title: Generate and export sales and inventory reports
description: Verify managers can generate reports selecting various parameters and export data correctly in supported formats.

steps.description: Navigate to reporting interface.
Select report type (sales, inventory, profit margin).
Choose filtering parameters (date, branch, product category).
Generate report.
Verify report displays correct data based on selected parameters.
Export the report in available formats (CSV, PDF).
Verify exported report matches displayed data and file is correctly formatted.

title: Role-based access control enforcement
description: Verify that system enforces access control policies preventing unauthorized users from accessing restricted features.

steps.description: Log in as cashier.
Attempt to access inventory management, batch editing, or branch transfer functions.
Verify access is denied or restricted functionality displayed.
Log in as inventory manager.
Verify access to inventory management and batch editing is granted.
Log in as branch manager.
Verify access to branch inventory transfer features is granted.

title: UI responsiveness and theme switching
description: Verify that UI components render correctly on different screen sizes and support light/dark mode toggling.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes.
Verify UI components adapt properly and are usable on all screen sizes.
Toggle between light and dark mode UI themes.
Verify UI colors and elements adjust correctly without visual defects.

title: Search functionality in inventory and sales
description: Validate that users can search inventory and past sales by multiple fields including product name, batch, category, and invoice number.

steps.description: Navigate to inventory screen.
Search inventory by product name.
Verify search results match the search term.
Navigate to sales history.
Search sales by invoice number or date range.
Verify relevant sales records are shown matching search criteria.

title: Performance under concurrent usage
description: Verify the system can sustain at least 20 concurrent active users performing transactions without degradation in response time or failures.

steps.description: Simulate 20 concurrent users performing sales, refunds, inventory updates and report generation.
Verify no significant performance degradation and system processes 1000+ transactions daily smoothly.

title: Handle insufficient inventory on sale
description: Verify system prevents sales that exceed available inventory including partial oil volume availability and shows appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Attempt to sell product quantity exceeding available stock.
Verify sale is blocked and user is notified about insufficient stock.
Attempt to sell partial oil volume exceeding remaining volume in open bottle.
Verify sale is blocked with appropriate message.

title: Validate input fields with schema validation
description: Validate that all input fields across forms such as product creation, sales, refunds enforce schema constraints and provide user-friendly error messages.

steps.description: Enter invalid values (empty, incorrect data types, out of range) in product creation form.
Verify validation errors are shown guided by Zod schemas.
Attempt sales with invalid quantities or missing payment details.
Verify form submission is blocked and relevant error messages shown.
